title: And Just Like That....Season Finale - Episode 10 Review - "Seeing The Light"
itunes:title: And Just Like That....Season Finale - Episode 10 Review - "Seeing The Light"
itunes:subtitle: And just like that...we surprisingly want a second season
description:
It's the season finale and we never thought we'd say it, but we're actually sad the season is over! On this week's review we ask the hard hitting questions like how could Carrie not mention the sticky note break up, how is it cool to hook up with someone in the midst of a phone call (Seema we're looking at you girl) and how did the writers think Miranda choosing love over her career made sense given the entirety of her character arc, traits and mannerisms in Sex & the City? All in all, we still don't like Che, we're pretty annoyed with Rock and Madz gloats over her early season call out about the hot podcast producer.


Join us this week as we go down the rabbit hole on the season finale of And Just Like That where we summarize what we loved, what we hated and what we can't wait to see more of in upcoming seasons!


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
